so with the Oscars right around the

it's a bit of a just generic Disney

nothing really special in the story
Department the rest of the film is a ton

just don't really have a ton to say
about this I'll give Moana an 8.5 out of

I had such a fun time with this if you

well shot and really well edited it's

gives one of the best performances of
his career the kid who plays Ricky is

protective services woman is amazing
again if you just want to laugh and go

people the movie does go from amazing to
just good towards the end as a lot of

it is still excellent and even the
ending made me smile it's just a film
that makes you smile I'll give it an 8.7
out of 10 now let's talk about a film

the movie's well shot and really well

not a lot happens just know that going
in but it is still really interesting
and compelling because of these

somehow I was never bored once while
